you
it's like you know it's what you gotta

Brooklyn it's big washers and dryers

get here the better I like to come here
like early in the morning if I can five
in the morning to beat the crowd on

their clothes here from sunup to sundown

where the stage is reset every 27

with me

from being living at home doing my

are sticklers about machine settings I
like the fact that there are four

delicate normal permanent press so that
